schedule.name:
Spring Thursday
Friday if the player has 6+ hearts with Leah

schedules.description: At home
Leaves home and heads to Pierre's General Store
Leaves Pierre's and heads home for the night

schedule.name: Spring Friday and Sunday If the player has less than 6 hearts with Leah

schedules.description: At home
Leaves his cabin to stand on the docks next to Willy's house
Leaves the docks to visit The Stardrop Saloon
Leaves the saloon to return home for the night
At home
Leaves his cabin to stand on the beach south of his house
Leaves the beach and returns to his cabin
Leaves his cabin to stand on the bridge just north of the beach
Leaves the bridge to return home for the night
Leaves his house and goes to the Clinic
Moves from waiting room to examination room inside Clinic
Leaves the clinic and returns home for the night
